name: Skelescape
description: Skelescape is a game where you play as a little skeleton who is out to save the electricity of their city, Skeletown. You must stop the robots and use their parts to fix the computers in the main power grid to save Skeletown from their crisis. A is the key Z, B is the key X, start is the key enter, and directional buttons are the arrow keys. Made for the first Lospec Game Jam.
